The blind-beggar of Bednal-green vvith the merry humor of Tom Strowd the Norfolk yeoman, as it was divers times publickly acted by the Princes Servants / written by John Day. Day, John, 1574-1640? Chettle, Henry, d. 1607?
[70] p.
Printed for R. Pollard, and Tho. Dring ..., London : 1659.
Written in 1600 in collaboration with Henry Chettle.--Cf. DNB. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
